name: Penny Pusher
description:
Hey guys! 

I'm new here, this is my first ever game made in UE4 after no previous experience in game dev. Its taken me almost a year so far, juggling between my family and a full time job, I've been working on this in my spare time and feel like its in a somewhat playable state now. 

Please give it a go, and give me as much feedback as possible. 

Once I've added SFX and squashed some more bugs, I will be uploading an early access version to Google Play for Android to see whether people want this kind of game, and if it does well ill be adding more content, mechanics and features. 

Follow me on twitter! https://twitter.com/_I_DID_THAT_

*Please bare in mind that the build is optimized for Android devices and not PC*
